General.Name: Kunshan Huguang Auto Harness Co Ltd
General.Description: Kunshan Huguang Auto Harness Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of automotive high and low voltage wiring harness assembly products in China and internationally. The company provides engine, KSK, door, HV, front cabin, instrument, cable, and ABS wire harness products. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Kunshan, China.

3.Name: Mr. Lei  Cheng
3.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Director
